question.title: What is the primary purpose of the Allen manoeuvre?
question.description: A medical procedure used to improve blood flow to the hands

option_a.title: To improve circulation to the fingers
option_a.description: A common misconception about the Allen manoeuvre

option_b.title: To treat Raynaud's phenomenon
option_b.description: A possible but incorrect use of the Allen manoeuvre

option_c.title: To relieve digital ischaemia
option_c.description: A correct description of the Allen manoeuvre's purpose

option_d.title: To diagnose frostbite
option_d.description: An incorrect but plausible use of the Allen manoeuvre
